wikipedia_page.main: Tim Hollier (1947 – 5 July 2017) was a British folk musician who released several albums in the late 1960s and 1970s. He went on to work in music publishing.

response: * 2011: commissioned to write The Edinburgh Suite by Tim Hollier of Atlantic Screen Music
*Tim Hollier, 69–70, British musician and publisher, complications of surgery.R.I.P. Tim Hollier
